about_the_game:
Stargate: SG-1 Roleplaying Game

Enter the wormhole for adventure The Tau'ri need your help in the fight against the Goa'uld. Stationed on an undisclosed world under the control of Stargate Command, you will start your training as a new recruit into the Stargate program. The year is 2002. Stargate Command has started to turn the tide against the Goa'uld. By all reports, Apophis is finally dead. System Lords across the galaxy have started to fall. A coalition of forces consisting of Free Jaffa, Tok'ra, species from other worlds, and the Tau'ri have come together. The battle for the Milky Way Galaxy is going well. Or so we think... Inside this product, you'll find:
  • All the rules you need to play or run a game of Stargate: SG-1
  • Eleven character races, including Abydonians, Tau'ri, Tollens, Jaffa, Tok'ra, Unas, and more.
  • Six character classes, including the diplomat, engineer, medic, scientist, scout, and soldier.
  • Dozens of origins and feats to further customize and develop your Stargate character.
  • Weapons, armor, and gear from the Tau'ri, Jaffa, and the Goa'uld. Everything you need to successfully carry on a SG mission.
  • An in-depth exploration of the Stargate system and setting.
  • Rules for vehicles, ranging from the MALP to the SGC's newest weapon against the Goa'uld - the F-302.
  • Complete rules for combat and diplomatic missions alike. Unique rules that help keep characters of all occupations engaged in order to complete the missions.
  • A fully-customizable system that allows each class to delve into various secondary interests, such as an engineer learning scientist abilities.
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
  • Rules to play in a drag and drop format
  • Characters are automated and calculate and recalculate various stats
  • Character creation automation by dragging and dropping races, origins, and classes onto the main tab of the character sheet
  • Full NPC and monster support
detailed_description:
Stargate: SG-1 Roleplaying Game

Enter the wormhole for adventure The Tau'ri need your help in the fight against the Goa'uld. Stationed on an undisclosed world under the control of Stargate Command, you will start your training as a new recruit into the Stargate program. The year is 2002. Stargate Command has started to turn the tide against the Goa'uld. By all reports, Apophis is finally dead. System Lords across the galaxy have started to fall. A coalition of forces consisting of Free Jaffa, Tok'ra, species from other worlds, and the Tau'ri have come together. The battle for the Milky Way Galaxy is going well. Or so we think... Inside this product, you'll find:
  • All the rules you need to play or run a game of Stargate: SG-1
  • Eleven character races, including Abydonians, Tau'ri, Tollens, Jaffa, Tok'ra, Unas, and more.
  • Six character classes, including the diplomat, engineer, medic, scientist, scout, and soldier.
  • Dozens of origins and feats to further customize and develop your Stargate character.
  • Weapons, armor, and gear from the Tau'ri, Jaffa, and the Goa'uld. Everything you need to successfully carry on a SG mission.
  • An in-depth exploration of the Stargate system and setting.
  • Rules for vehicles, ranging from the MALP to the SGC's newest weapon against the Goa'uld - the F-302.
  • Complete rules for combat and diplomatic missions alike. Unique rules that help keep characters of all occupations engaged in order to complete the missions.
  • A fully-customizable system that allows each class to delve into various secondary interests, such as an engineer learning scientist abilities.
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
  • Rules to play in a drag and drop format
  • Characters are automated and calculate and recalculate various stats
  • Character creation automation by dragging and dropping races, origins, and classes onto the main tab of the character sheet
  • Full NPC and monster support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
